system.effect: When in Melee Combat, for each ally with the Bonding Ritual Talent who are engaged with the same target, the Explorer gains +5 to Weapon Skill Tests and +1 Damage on melee attacks.

description.value: When in Melee Combat, for each ally with the Bonding Ritual Talent who are engaged with the same target, the Explorer gains +5 to Weapon Skill Tests and +1 Damage on melee attacks.
